title: David and Lisa (1962 Drama) Directed by Frank Perry | Love Found Where Minds Are Lost

sources.title: David and Lisa (1962 Drama) Directed by Frank Perry | Love Found Where Minds Are Lost
sources.description:
David, an intelligent but emotionally distant teenager, fears physical touch and struggles with obsessive thoughts. Perturbed, David's overbearing mother places him in a home for mentally disturbed young people. Where he meets Lisa, a young woman with dissociative tendencies who alternates between two distinct personas: one childlike and playful, the other deeply fearful. Despite their challenges, the two form a unique bond that transcends traditional communication, helping each other confront their inner struggles.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/hCa3yTo8hPY


Director: Frank Perry
Writers: Eleanor Perry, Theodore Isaac Rubin
Stars: Keir Dullea, Janet Margolin, Howard Da Silva
Genres:  Drama, Romance, Psychological
